name: Apothecary (Emily)
description:
Apothecary is a point and click adventure game made for the Ludum Dare 43 Game Jam by Emily (Me), Sam, Burju and Liam.

My role was the writer for this game.

You, the player, are an apprentice herb specialist in China. You are given a series of patient files and herbs, but you are unsure of which herb is for which symptom. Open up and read each patient file and pay close attention to their symptoms, then choose which herb you think is appropriate in the time frame. Some you will cure, some you will not. Any learnt effects will be stored in your journal for later on.
